channel.title: Dynamic Monitor Props
channel.description:
Hey! It's me, again. I know i'm gonna ask too much things since i'm learner. Sorry about that, i'm asking what i cannot find by googling hard.
I want some working PC Monitor Props in my map, but not like cameras to monitor some part of map. I want them to play some random videos like scripted SFM scenes and/or some gif screensavers i created.
Don't know about gif's and videos but i think using a tiny decal on a monitor will do the static vision thing. Not sure if there's a better way to do it.
Thanks, peace ^^

item.title: Dynamic Monitor Props
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
There’s really two ways to do this- one is with animated textures, which can be created using VTFEdit, the other is by setting up a “play” of what you want to display in some box outside of the explorable section of your map and using cameras to display it.
